mTradingPostBuilt.description: Has a trading post been built

mPendingTutorial.description: Array of pending tutorial IDs that should be shown when possible ( no other widgets on screen etc )

mHasCompletedIntroTutorial.description: Indicates if the player has completed the introduction tutorial

mHasCompletedIntroSequence.description: Indicates that the introduction sequence is done (right now, drop pod sequence)

mTradingPostDescriptor.description: The class of the trading post

mIntroTutorialData.description: Data used for the intro tutorial

mDropPodItemClass.description: An item you receive when dismantling the drop pod so we can identify it

mDidDismantleDropPod.description: Checks if we have dismantled the drop pod

mStunSpearItemClass.description: class to identify the stun spear

mDidEquipStunSpear.description: Checks if we equipped the stun spear

mStep1UpgradeSchematic.description: Reference to the class step 1 tutorial schematic

mStep1_5UpgradeSchematic.description: Reference to the class step 1.5 tutorial schematic

mStep2UpgradeSchematic.description: Reference to the class step 2 tutorial schematic

mStep3UpgradeSchematic.description: Reference to the class step 3 tutorial schematic

mStep4UpgradeSchematic.description: Reference to the class step 4 tutorial schematic

mStep5UpgradeSchematic.description: Reference to the class step 5 tutorial schematic

mStartingPodClass.description: Class of drop pod to spawn

mStartingPod.description: Reference to starting pod ( server only )

mTradingPostLevel.description: The upgrade level we have on our trading post

mWaitTimeAfterCompletingMinorStep.description: Time to wait after completing a minor tutorial step and displaying the next

mWaitTimeAfterCompletingHubStep.description: Time to wait after completing a trading post step and displaying the next

mHoldToSkipTimerHandle.description: An unknown type (likely an Unreal Engine or plugin type).

mRecipesToGivePlayersSkippingTutorial.description: List of recipes that player should get the items of if the player chooses to skip the tutorial
